As part of Alexion’s CSR materiality assessment, we examined how 
our material topics aligned with the UN SDGs through a quantitative 
mapping exercise. We reviewed each of Alexion’s 19 material topics 
against the 169 targets contained within the 17 SDGs. Unsurprisingly, 
our strongest alignment is with Goal No. 3, Good Health and Well-Being. 
Other areas of strong alignment include Goals 4, 5, 8, 9, 10, 12 and 17.
